name: Western Shootout (Stephen Dunn, Najira)
description:
Made for the KrassJam 11 over 2 days, by Stephen Dunn and Anna Yuna Gadiou.

This project was taken to learn Godot for the first time, while Anna was learning Photoshop and Aseprite.HOW TO PLAY:
Click ready and don't move your mouse from the holster area until it disapears, doing so will result in the DQ. After that it's who has the quickest reactions wins.

What's your best round? Post in the comments your score.
